content: HOUSTON Exports of liquefied petroleum gas out of Enterprise Products Partners Houston Ship Channel terminal could average a record 17.5 million barrels this month if weather conditions permit  chief executive Jim Teague said on Thursday at a conference.
name: Enterprise Products Partners LP
title: Enterprise Products Partners eyes record LPG exports for January: CEO

title: Enterprise's Seaway Crude pipeline system shut after Cushing  Oklahoma spill

content: NEW YORK Oil and gas pipeline company Enterprise Products Partners  submitted a new  all-stock bid for rival Williams Cos Inc  in late August  topping a previous bid from earlier in the summer  according to a source familiar with the matter.
name: Enterprise Products Partners LP
title: Enterprise made new bid for Williams in late August: source

name: Enterprise Products Partners LP

content: HOUSTON Enterprise Products Partners on Thursday said the first ship to load ethane for export from its new terminal on the Houston Ship Channel will arrive on Aug. 1  the first such export of the light natural gas liquid from the U.S. Gulf Coast.
name: Enterprise Products Partners LP
title: Enterprise to export first ethane cargo from Houston terminal in August

name: Enterprise Products Partners LP
title: UPDATE 1-Enterprise to export first ethane cargo from Houston terminal in August

content: BRASILIA  March 21 Brazilian petrochemical company Braskem SA signed a 10-year contract with U.S.-based Enterprise Products Partners LP for the supply of ethane imported from the United States  Braskem said in a statement on Monday.
name: Enterprise Products Partners LP
title: Brazil's Braskem contracts to buy ethane from Enterprise Products

content: HOUSTON  Feb 24 Enterprise Products Partners  expects to export 6 million barrels of crude and condensate out of its Gulf Coast terminal in March  its chief executive said at the IHS CERAWeek conference in Houston on Wednesday.
name: Enterprise Products Partners LP
title: Enterprise Products Partners to export 6 mln bbls of crude/condensate in March

content: Dec 23 Enterprise Products Partners LP  said it won its first contract to export U.S crude  days after the U.S. Congress voted to lift a four-decade ban on oil exports.
name: Enterprise Products Partners LP
title: Enterprise Products secures first crude oil export contract
